body:
Hey guys, I was thinking of getting a laptop, and since I know absolutely nothing of computers I was wondering what you guys thought a good laptop is to run minecraft. My price range is 0-1000$ (I know nothing of  laptops and electronics)
Thanks
-tadhgfrancis (Pronounced: Tygefrancis. XD)
body_tagged:
Hey guys, I was thinking of getting a laptop, and since I know absolutely nothing of computers I was wondering what you guys thought a good laptop is to run minecraft. My price range is 0-1000$ (I know nothing of  laptops and electronics)
Thanks
-tadhgfrancis (Pronounced: Tygefrancis. XD)
title: Laptop recommendations

replies.body: If you can, you should go for making your own desktop. You can save a lot more money by making your own and it will run way faster. (Many people here can help you.)
replies.body_tagged: If you can, you should go for making your own desktop. You can save a lot more money by making your own and it will run way faster. (Many people here can help you.)

replies.body: None, a laptop for gaming is money wasting. Get your dekstop, I won't recommend any laptops since they are all so little and weak.
replies.body_tagged: None, a laptop for gaming is money wasting. Get your dekstop, I won't recommend any laptops since they are all so little and weak.

replies.body: I have a Lenovo laptop that was made in 2009 and still gives me like 200-300 fps on Minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: I have a Lenovo laptop that was made in 2009 and still gives me like 200-300 fps on Minecraft.

replies.body: Ok thanks. This is much appreciated
replies.body_tagged: Ok thanks. This is much appreciated

replies.body: Unless you really need the portability of a laptop, don't bother with finding one; just build a desktop like everyone else has said.
replies.body_tagged: Unless you really need the portability of a laptop, don't bother with finding one; just build a desktop like everyone else has said.

replies.body: Thanks, but since I want a laptop because it's portable, do you guys have any recommendations for laptops that can run minecraft quite well?
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, but since I want a laptop because it's portable, do you guys have any recommendations for laptops that can run minecraft quite well?

replies.body:
http://bargainvalley.com/GP70-LEOPARD-490/Dragon-Army-GP70-Leopard-490-17.3-Notebook---Intel-Core-i5-i5-4210H-2.90-GHz---Black---8-GB-RAM---1-TB-HDD---DVD-Writer---NVIDIA-In.htm?feed=Froogle



I have the same one but for 350$ cause I bought it from my cousin usually run 150-300 fps

But it I wouldn't recommend buying it from this website

replies.body: My Lenovo W510 is great and I assume the W550 is even better, but they are very expensive. Here is a link to the W series: http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/thinkpad/w-series/. If you want something cheaper try the Y series http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/lenovo/y-series/. Also Lenovo makes some of the best laptop keyboards out there. (You should look at the reviews on their website as well as on Amazon.)
replies.body_tagged: My Lenovo W510 is great and I assume the W550 is even better, but they are very expensive. Here is a link to the W series: http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/thinkpad/w-series/. If you want something cheaper try the Y series http://shop.lenovo.com/us/en/laptops/lenovo/y-series/. Also Lenovo makes some of the best laptop keyboards out there. (You should look at the reviews on their website as well as on Amazon.)
